name: MakeHole

arguments.name: r1
arguments.desc: Hole radius for medium materials. May not be bigger than r0. Default zero.

arguments.name: r2
arguments.desc: Hole radius for hard materials. May not be bigger than r1. Default zero.

arguments.name: silent
arguments.desc: Make hole without playing any break sounds.

returns.name: count
returns.desc: Number of voxels that was cut out. This will be zero if there were no changes to any shape.

description: Make a hole in the environment. Radius is given in meters.
Soft materials: glass, foliage, dirt, wood, plaster and plastic.
Medium materials: concrete, brick and weak metal.
Hard materials: hard metal and hard masonry.
